## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G21070](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G21070)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATNADK-1, NADK1</u>
- **Gene Name:** NAD KINASE 1, NAD kinase 1
- **Description:**   NAD kinase 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [ndk1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Upon treatment with paraquat (an inducer of reactive oxygen species), the leaves of the mutant develop a purple colour (flavonoid anthocyanin) on their abaxial surfaces.
   - [ndk1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;When grown on soil, the aerial parts of the mutant show reduced growth relative to wildtype, with no apparent change in plant morphology. This difference was not observed when the mutant was grown on MS medium.
